episode: I had a big test at school that I had to retake after failing. This time, I passed with a 95

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I failed a test in college and then retook it this semester and passed with a 95! All it took was actually preparing.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing! Your hard work paid off!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I studied every day. I can't believe I failed last time

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great you didn't give up!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was just pure laziness the firs time.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: We all have those moments.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah. But now I'm almost done with college and graduating with honors.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic! Congratulations!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks. Better late than never.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How do I make sure to continue this way of thinking with other aspects of my life?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Set goals and stay disciplined.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's hard, though. I'm naturally lazy.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Start small and build habits.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Like what? How do I stay prepared for things like work and general life?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Use planners or reminders to stay organized.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I guess so. Sounds old fashioned.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Or try apps for a digital approach.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah. I think its more mental, though.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Practice mindfulness.
